feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 40 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
